Markup & Document Structure

HTML Document Structure
Tools

Notepad, Browser

Objective

Understand the basic HTML document structure

Instructions
  1. Continue from previous lession.
  2. Declare the proper HTML document declaration.
  3. Declare title and style tags.
  4. Wrap body contents.
